channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The 10-year Treasury yield is nearing 5% again. Why stock-market investors are freaking out.
item.description: U.S. Treasury yields have soared over the past week, propelling the 10-year rate to the brink of the 5% mark rarely seen since the global financial cr...

item.title: Nasdaq, S&P 500 Fall; Oil Extends Rally
item.description: The Nasdaq Composite and S&P 500 fell, with new export curbs weighing on Nvidia and other chip stocks. The Dow crept higher.

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Extend Gains on Weather Outlook
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures tested new highs with colder-than-usual weather over much of the country seen lasting through January, and prospects for grea...

item.title: Euro Could Fall Further in Short Term Due to Trump Policies, Fed Outlook
item.description: The euro fell to its lowest level in more than two years and could fall further in the short term, amid the threat of tariffs and the likelihood of th...

item.title: Goldman Sees Financing as the Future. It Is Rearranging Itself to Reflect That.
item.description: The Wall Street giant’s new group will capitalize on a private-credit surge and anticipated private-equity deal boom.

item.title: Eagles star A.J. Brown sends self-help book ‘Inner Excellence’ from 523,497th place to No. 1 on Amazon
item.description: While Tom Brady and author Jim Murphy were surprised to see Brown reading the book on the bench, the wide receiver said he brings it to every game.

item.title: Gold's Near-Term Outlook Threatened by Rising Bond Yields, StoneX Says
item.description: Gold futures were trading lower on lower expectations of Fed rate cuts, and StoneX said near-term near-term forecasts looked more bearish as rising yi...

item.title: My 90-year-old parents’ neighbor is friendly, nice and, I suspect, a predator. Am I wrong?
item.description: “He tells my parents to ignore me when I suggest that it’s time to look into senior-living situations.”

item.title: I’m blindsided by extra Medicare charges because of my income. How do I avoid this situation?
item.description: A reader is trying to plan ahead to avoid the dreaded IRMAA, a surcharge that can come out of your Social Security check.

item.title: Unhappy with your Medicare Advantage? You have one more chance to change your mind.
item.description: It’s open enrollment for Medicare Advantage. You can switch or drop your plan — but make sure you check your Medigap coverage
